name: Anger
desc: Deal 7 damage. Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

name: Clash
desc: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.

name: Demon Form
desc: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength.

name: Fire Breathing
desc: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.

name: Heavy Blade
desc: Deal 14 damage. Strength affects this card 3 times.

name: Infernal Blade
desc: Add a random Attack into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

name: Power Through
desc: Add 2 Wounds into your hand. Gain 15 Block.

name: Regret
desc: At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

name: Thunderclap
desc: Deal 4 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Whirlwind
desc: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies X times.
